msg:
## snapshotting:
# creates a snapshot:
virsh snapshot-create-as "$vmname" "$snapshotname" "$descripton" --atomic

# lists snapshots:
virsh snapshot-list "$vmname" [--tree]

# restores snapshot:
virsh snapshot-revert "$vmname" "$snapshotname"

# deletes a snapshot:
virsh snapshot-delete "$vmname" "$snapshotname"
